title: Palace Guardians: Pałace Schlosser cudownie wyglądały przed wojną
description: DATAsculptor plants dormant photon-wurms in the archival negatives of Schloss Groschowitz, Schloss Löwenstein near Oppeln, and Schloss Tarnowitz. At 3 a.m. each sphere awakens, projects pre-war facades onto the crumbling walls as bioluminescent overlays, then erodes into pixels that drift across O/S like migrating fireflies—ghostly reassembly of cudownie pałace memory.

title: Przerażający Pałac Valeski: Neural Wurm Komnata
description: DATAsculptor infiltrates Valeski Palace in Oppeln, projecting a midnight-blue ghost-network of resettlement census nodes through shattered windows; Silesian dialect glyphs crawl like amber-gold worms across crumbling walls, mapping 18 years of displaced memories while wind sensors translate gusts into pulsating magenta light—Komnata Tajemnic re-opened as a breathing data-cathedral.
